Message:
On the Holy Night,
there’s something that
I just have to give Big Sis.

When we still lived
at our old house,
I was knitting together
a scarf for her.

But, before I had
the chance to finish it,
the two of us were...

Back then, I couldn’t
give Big Sis that scarf.
But this time,
I will finish knitting it.

Just like how she knitted
this scarf for me
all those years ago.

No matter how freezing it got,
as long as I had her scarf
wrapped around me,
I never got cold.

It felt like her love
was protecting me.

That’s why, this time,
I’m gonna be sure to make
Big Sis all nice and warm.
